alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 11:25AM CST until December 14 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST /MIDNIGHT CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between a trace and 4 inches with ice accumulations between a trace and a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of east central Colorado and northwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...From 7 AM MST /8 AM CST/ this morning to 11 PM MST /midnight CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The potential for ice will depend on the temperature. A few degrees change in temperature will determine whether or not freezing rain and ice develops. Freezing rain will be more likely if temperatures are near 32 degrees during the day.
info.instruction: Be alert for slick surfaces and roadways. Surfaces may become icy either from freezing rain or any liquid that falls and freezes later today. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Greeley; Logan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace; Wichita
